template.name: w_base_app
template.value:
from h2o_wave import main, app, Q, ui
@app('/$URL$') async def serve(q: Q): $END$ await q.page.save()
template.description: Basic scaffolding for a wave app

template.name: w_base_script
template.value:
from h2o_wave import site, ui
page = site['/$SITE$'] $END$ page.save()
template.description: Basic scaffolding for a wave script

template.name: w_page
template.description: Creates a new page for card

template.name: w_on_route
template.value: @on(arg='#$ROUTE$') async def handle_$ROUTE$(q: Q): $END$ await q.page.save()

template.name: w_on_route_param
template.value: @on(arg='#$ROUTE$/{$PARAM$}') async def handle_$ROUTE$(q: Q, $PARAM$: str): $END$ await q.page.save()

template.name: w_simple_tall_app
template.value:
q.page['meta'] = ui.meta_card(box='', layouts=[ui.layout(breakpoint='xs', zones=[ ui.zone(name='$MAIN$', size='100vh', zones=[ ui.zone(name='$HEADER$'), ui.zone(name='$BODY$', size='1'), ui.zone(name='$FOOTER$'), ]), ])])
q.page['header'] = ui.header_card(box='$HEADER$', title='Header', subtitle='Subtitle') q.page['body'] = ui.form_card(box='$BODY$', items=[ui.text(content='I am body!')]) q.page['footer'] = ui.footer_card(box='$FOOTER$', caption='Footer caption') $END$

template.name: w_grid_app
template.value: q.page['meta'] = ui.meta_card(box='', layouts=[ui.layout('xs', zones=[ ui.zone('$GRID$', direction=ui.ZoneDirection.ROW, wrap='stretch', justify='center') ])]) q.page[f'$CARD$_1'] = ui.form_card(box=ui.box('$GRID$', width='$WIDTH$'), items=[ui.text(content='I am a card!')]) q.page[f'$CARD$_2'] = ui.form_card(box=ui.box('$GRID$', width='$WIDTH$'), items=[ui.text(content='I am a card!')]) q.page[f'$CARD$_3'] = ui.form_card(box=ui.box('$GRID$', width='$WIDTH$'), items=[ui.text(content='I am a card!')]) q.page[f'$CARD$_4'] = ui.form_card(box=ui.box('$GRID$', width='$WIDTH$'), items=[ui.text(content='I am a card!')]) q.page[f'$CARD$_5'] = ui.form_card(box=ui.box('$GRID$', width='$WIDTH$'), items=[ui.text(content='I am a card!')])

template.name: w_simple_wide_app
template.value:
q.page['meta'] = ui.meta_card(box='', layouts=[ui.layout(breakpoint='xs', zones=[ ui.zone(name='$MAIN$', size='100vh', direction=ui.ZoneDirection.ROW, zones=[ ui.zone(name='$SIDEBAR$', size='$SIDEBAR_WIDTH$'), ui.zone(name='$BODY$', size='1'), ]) ])])
q.page['sidebar'] = ui.nav_card( box='$SIDEBAR$', title='Header', subtitle='Subtitle', color='primary', image='$LOGO$', items=[ ui.nav_group('Menu', items=[ ui.nav_item(name='#menu/spam', label='Spam'), ui.nav_item(name='#menu/ham', label='Ham'), ui.nav_item(name='#menu/eggs', label='Eggs'), ]), ]) q.page['body'] = ui.form_card(box='$BODY$', items=[ui.text(content='I am a body!')]) $END$

template.name: w_complex_app
template.value:
q.page['meta'] = ui.meta_card(box='', layouts=[ui.layout(breakpoint='xs', zones=[ ui.zone(name='$MAIN$', size='100vh', direction=ui.ZoneDirection.ROW, zones=[ ui.zone(name='$SIDEBAR$', size='$SIDEBAR_WIDTH$'), ui.zone(name='body', zones=[ ui.zone(name='$HEADER$'), ui.zone(name='$CONTENT$', size='1'), ]), ]) ])])
q.page['sidebar'] = ui.nav_card( box='$SIDEBAR$', title='', subtitle='', color='primary', image='$LOGO$', items=[ ui.nav_group('Menu', items=[ ui.nav_item(name='#menu/spam', label='Spam'), ui.nav_item(name='#menu/ham', label='Ham'), ui.nav_item(name='#menu/eggs', label='Eggs'), ]), ]) q.page['header'] = ui.header_card(box='$HEADER$', title='', subtitle='', items=[ ui.textbox(name='search', icon='Search', width='300px', placeholder='Search...'), ]) q.page['body'] = ui.form_card(box='$CONTENT$', items=[ui.text(content='Content')]) $END$
template.description: Complex layout with both sidenav and topnav
